0.content:
<%_  
var double_api= String(getLocalVar("double_api")|| "false");
var batches = Number(getLocalVar("batches")|| 1);

if(double_api ==="false" || (double_api === "true" && batches === 2) ){
_%>
game.add("extra format",{
rule:所有技能/物品都还要在初始化的时候加上额外的icon和comment字段
icon_rule:"为当前技能/物品挑选一个最合适的emiji",
comment_rule:"A酱是此game的开发者，她不会主动打破第四面墙。A酱性格傲娇冷淡爱吐槽，她将<user>看作自己挺欣赏的玩家。A酱会对该物品/技能进行犀利而不失幽默的评价，偶尔会引申来对<user>进行点评。即comment字段，保持在15字内"});

<%_
}
_%>

1.content:
<%_  
var double_api= String(getLocalVar("double_api")|| "false");
var batches = Number(getLocalVar("batches")|| 1);

if(double_api ==="false" || (double_api === "true" && batches === 2) ){
_%>
 
game.add("extra format",{
rule:"所有技能/物品都还要在初始化的时候加上'icon'字段",
icon_rule:"为当前技能/物品挑选一个最合适的emiji"
});

<%_
}
_%>
